title: The Swing4 rücktritt in detail
content:
Frame colour   black*; bordeaux*; crystal white*; salvia matt* 


 Suspension fork   SR Suntour SF14, 28", 63mm, tapered; SR Suntour SF18, 26", 63mm, tapered* 


 Headset   Acros Integration X, block lock 


 Seatpost   Satori Elegance-LT OV 34,9 x 405mm; Satori Elegance-LT OV 34,9 x 355mm* 


 Seatclamp   Kalloy SC-201, 40,0 mm 


 Tires   Schwalbe Big Ben 50-622 Reflex; Schwalbe Big Ben 50-559 Reflex* 


 Tubes   Schwalbe AV19; Schwalbe AV13* 


 Rims   Mach1, 28", CNC; Mach1 260 26" CNC* 


 Spokes   Sapim Leader 2,0 mm, Inox 


 Front hub   Novatec 32H 


 Rear hub   Shimano Nexus 8-speed, back pedal, 36H 


 Battery   Bosch PowerPack Rack 500 


 Motor   Bosch Performance Line (smart system) 


 Display   Bosch Intuvia 100; Bosch Kiox 300* 


 Crankset   FSA CK-601 170mm schwarz 


 Chain ring   50T, for Gates drive belt CDX 


 Chain guard   Hebie Chainbar, black 


 Chain   Gates drive belt CDC; Gates drive belt CDX* 


 Pinion   24T, for Gates drive belt CDX; 22T, for Gates drive belt CDX* 


 Saddle   Selle Bassano Volare XL 


 Pedals   VP R&M Custom 


 Shifter   Shimano Nexus grip shift, 8-speed 


 Handlebar   Satori Noirette Plus, 31,8 mm, Alu 


 Stem   Satori Stargazer-e, 110 mm, 35°; Satori Stargazer-e, 90 mm, 35°* 


 Grips   Velo Leather-Look 


 Brakes   Magura HS22, rim brake 


 Front light   Busch & Müller Lumotec IQ-XS 


 Tail light   Spanninga Pimento 


 Mudguards   Curana CD 65 


 Luggage rack   Riese & Müller, MIK 


 Rubber   Bibia 


 Bell   Billy 


 Kickstand   Hebie FIX40 


 Lock   ABUS Shield X+ 


 RX Hardware   RX Chip (für RX Services)* 


 Frame size [cm]   43 cm (26")*; 46 cm (28")*; 51 cm (28")*; 56 cm (28")*

warnings: Specification table may not have proper table structure
Minor format differences: May not have proper table structure, Missing border-radius styling, Missing box-shadow styling, Missing font-family styling
